Tooltips

Tooltips can be added to any element. Documentation on all tooltip options can be found on the Bootstrap tooltips page.

Bootstrap tooltips usually need to be initialized manually. However in the toolkit any element with the class tooltip-anchor is initialized and also styled using our icon font.
